metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28374 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Debian courier-authlib package before 0.71.1-2 for Courier Authentication Library creates a /run/courier/authdaemon directory with weak permissions, allowing an attacker to read user information. This may include a cleartext password in some configurations. In general, it includes the user's existence, uid and gids, home and/or Maildir directory, quota, and some type of password information (such as a hash).

criterions.comment: courier-authlib package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
